Version 2.0.87 - Enforce 8-Flow Behavior for All SCORM Vendors

Bug Fixes

  • Fix tag navigation inflating progress: furthestSlide no longer advances during tag sessions (sendProgressUpdate, suspend_data tracking, Captivate vs field all guarded)
  • Fix tag navigation inflating DB values: lesson_location and score.raw capped at furthestSlide during tag sessions to prevent resume from wrong position
  • Fix post-intercept write: unconditionally write furthestSlide/score after tag navigation to correct any inflated DB values
  • Fix position bar dropping to 1 on refresh (iSpring, all vendors): suppress stale vendor poller reads during 10s resume protection window

Previous Versions

  • v2.0.86: Always set defineProperty traps; compute furthestSlide in trap; reduce vendor delays
  • v2.0.85: Fix resume correction suspend_data in LMSInitialize wrapper
  • v2.0.84: Fix Captivate position bar bugs (Generic 0-based misread)
  • v2.0.83: Refactor tracking_js.php into modular class files by SCORM vendor
